history.content:
Hello piazza community!

My name is William Schloetel, and I'm the lab manager for the Whitney Lab, a cognitive neuroscience research lab in the psychology department. We're currently in the process of renovating our website. I was hoping to find a few people interested in getting hands on experience with web development to help out with the process. My HTML/CSS/JavaScript chops just aren't quite up to the job! It would be fairly relaxed (no real back-end work), and it would be spread out over the next two months. There is no time commitment. It would just be us working casually on this. We could meet to work on the site whenever is convenient. Unfortunately, there is no pay, but this could still be a great resume/portfolio building opportunity. Shoot me an email or text if you are interested! Have a great afternoon.

w.schloetel@berkeley.edu

(805) 433-3356
history.subject: Website Development for the Whitney Lab
